gen:link.msg:message: `DirectInvestmentResults` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_DirectInvestmentResults')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_DirectInvestmentResults return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfDirectInvestmentResultsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfDirectInvestmentResultsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfDirectInvestmentResultsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfDirectInvestmentResultsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IndirectInvestmentResults` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_IndirectInvestmentResults')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_IndirectInvestmentResults return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIndirectInvestmentResultsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIndirectInvestmentResultsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIndirectInvestmentResultsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIndirectInvestmentResultsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentResultFromInvestmentEntity` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_InvestmentResultFromInvestmentEntity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_InvestmentResultFromInvestmentEntity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultFromInvestmentEntityCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultFromInvestmentEntityCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultFromInvestmentEntityDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentResultsBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultFromInvestmentEntityDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
